file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 30-12-01-07 - HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER ANTI-ICING VALVE - CLEANING/PAINTING

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL HORIZONTAL-STABILIZER ANTI-ICING VALVE - CLEANING/PAINTING EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to get access to the Horizontal Stabilizer Anti-Ice Valve. B. The procedure to clean the Horizontal Stabilizer Anti-Ice Valve Filter is in CMM 30-10-03 of Hamilton Standard. C. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY HORIZONTAL STABILIZER ANTI-ICE ALL 30-12-01-110-801-A VALVE FILTER - CLEANING EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 30-12-01 Page 1 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 30-12-01-110-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. HORIZONTAL STABILIZER ANTI-ICE VALVE FILTER - CLEANING A. General (1) The Horizontal Stabilizer Anti-Ice Valve is installed on the dorsal fin. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 20-40-02-910-801-A/200 STATIC GROUNDING - STANDARD PRACTICES HORIZONTAL STABILIZER VALVE FILTER - REMOV- AMM TASK 30-12-01-000-802-A/400 AL HORIZONTAL STABILIZER VALVE FILTER - INSTAL- AMM TASK 30-12-01-400-802-A/400 LATION CMM 30-10-03 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items ITEM DESCRIPTION PURPOSE QTY Commercially Goggles For protection of your eyes 1 available Commercially Gloves For protection of your hands 1 available Source of dry and filtered compressed Locally available To blow and dry 1 air Commercially Goggles For protection of your eyes 1 available F. Consumable Materials SPECIFICATION DESCRIPTION QTY (BRAND) Electro 140 Contact Cleaner, LPS AR G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended QTY FUNCTION PLACE 1 Does the task Dorsal fin EMB-145 - AMM 1285 110-801-A/700 30-12-01 Page 2 of 4 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Make sure that the aircraft is safe for maintenance. (2) Keep the aircraft grounded ( AMM TASK 20-40-02-910-801-A/200). (3) Remove the Horizontal Stabilizer Anti-Ice Valve filter (AMM TASK 30-12-01-000-802- A/400). J. Clean the Horizontal Stabilizer Anti-Ice Valve Filter (Figure 701) SUBTASK 170-002-A (1) Refer to the latest revision CMM 30-10-03 (Part Number 1000649-2), or do the steps that follow: WARNING: USE EYE AND HAND PROTECTION WHEN YOU USE AN AIR SOURCE TO CLEAN. CONTAMINANTS CAN BECOME AIRBORNE AND CAUSE INJURY TO YOUR EYES AND HANDS. THIS WILL HELP TO PREVENT INJURIES TO PERSON. (a) Blow air at 25 psi maximum pressure from a regulated source of air, to remove heavy contaminants. (b) Spray the Horizontal Stabilizer Anti-Ice Valve filter with an electro-contact cleaning solution. (c) To remove the residual cleaning solution, let the filter air-dry or blow it with at 25 psi maximum pressure from the air source. K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the Horizontal Stabilizer Anti-Ice Valve filter (AMM TASK 30-12-01-400-802-A/ 400).
